meta_header: RoleEver | Download for iOS and Android
meta_description: Download RoleEver for iOS or Android. All the tools you need to play RPGs by chat at your fingertips. Game chat, character sheets, dice rolls, custom game systems, d&d 5e integrations and much more. RoleEver is available both on iOS and Android!
